historia.parrafo1: A few years ago, in a place neither of us imagined, our eyes met for the first time. What began as a simple conversation turned into countless adventures, laughter, and shared dreams. Since that day, we have walked together, supporting each other at every step, learning, growing, and above all, loving each other more and more.
historia.parrafo2: Today, we want to celebrate the journey we've taken and take the next step in our story: joining our lives forever, surrounded by the people we love most.

cards.title: Ceremony
cards.description: We will be united in marriage in the Parish of Santa MarÃ­a in Trastevere, Rome, on Saturday, October 12, 2025 at 4:00 p.m.

cards.title: Reception
cards.description: After the ceremony, we look forward to seeing you at the Vatican starting at 7:00 p.m. to celebrate together with an evening filled with music, joy, and unforgettable moments.

cards.title: Dress Code
cards.description: Formal dress code. Men should wear dark suits, women should wear long dresses. Light, elegant colors are welcome for this special day.

galeria.descripcion: A glimpse at the moments that have brought us here. Photos full of love, adventures, and memories we want to share with you before our big day.

registro.heading: Let's share this special moment
registro.socialText: You can also find us on:

form.heading: Confirm your attendance
form.description: Your commitment is very important to us. Please complete the following form to confirm or decline your attendance.
form.messageLabel: Some words you'd like to share

hospedaje.heading: Nearby Lodging
hospedaje.description: For your convenience, we have selected some lodging options close to the event venue with different price ranges.

hotels.title: Hotel Indigo Rome - St. George
hotels.description: An elegant 5-star boutique hotel on the historic Via Giulia, featuring a spectacular terrace with views over all of Rome.

hotels.title: Starhotels Michelangelo Rome
hotels.description: A classic 4-star hotel steps from St. Peter's Square, offering timeless comfort and direct Vatican views.

hotels.title: Hotel Paolo II
hotels.description: A  modern and cozy 3-star option, noted for its excellent service and great value for money.

footer.quote: This is just the beginning of our most beautiful adventure.
